intro:
Don't push yourself too hard.
You can...
...be yourself with me.
description:
The Story:
Join The Public Safety Police Academy and dive into a world of men! In pursuit of your dreams of becoming a detective, your supervisor encourages you to enter The Public Safety Police Academy. But as it turns out, this school is full of elite and ruthless officers from around the country! Will you survive...?!

Characters:
Seiji Goto             "Lieutenant"
Hyogo Kaga           "Captain"
Hideki Ishigami       "Captain"
Shusuke Soma       "First Lieutenant"
Ayumu Shinonome  "Lieutenant"

Contents:
Includes "Main Stories" in the App "Love 365: Find Your Story."
up until "S2 Our Graduation Epilogue."
